---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(mgcv)

an_dat <- read.csv(("../data_processing/data/an_dat_pm25.csv"), row.names = 1)
an_dat <- an_dat %>% mutate(lag_wf_pm = lag(wf_pm25))
```

visitsA is outpatient visits.

visitsI is inpatient visits.

visitsR is ED visits .

visitsIC is cardiopulmonary? cardiovascular? inpatient visits.

visitsIR is cardiopulmonary? cardiovascular? ED visits.

```{r}
m1 <- gam(visitsA ~ non_wf_pm + s(lag_wf_pm) + s(tmean) + s(day), data = an_dat, family = nb(link = "log"))
plot(m1)
summary(m1)
```


```{r}
m2 <- gam(visitsI ~ non_wf_pm + s(lag_wf_pm) + s(tmean) + s(day), data = an_dat, family = nb(link = "log"))
plot(m2)
summary(m2)
```
